DOC.brief_title: Revaccination With Subunit Influenza A/Vietnam/1203/2004 ( H5N1 ) Vaccine
DOC.detailed_description: This open label , phase I evaluation single dose investigational inactivate , subunit influenza A/Vietnam/1203/2004 ( H5N1 ) vaccine subject previously vaccinate vaccine make antigenically distinct variant H5N1 . The study design determine whether immunization antigenic variant prime response single dose vaccine represent current pandemic threat . The primary objective determine ability prim dose rec H5 HA 1997 vaccine administer 7 year previously result booster response inactivate subunit influenza A/Vietnam/1203/2004 ( H5N1 ) vaccine . The secondary objective 1 ) determine safety booster dose intramuscular inactivated subunit influenza A/Vietnam/1203/2004 ( H5N1 ) vaccine healthy adult , previously vaccinate rec H5 HA 1997 vaccine 2 ) evaluate relationship priming , level antigen-specific memory B T cell , response reactivation . The study perform single site , enroll many previously vaccinated subject available eligible , maximum 117 . Subjects receive single intramuscular dose 90 mcg inactivate subunit influenza A/Vietnam/1203/2004 ( H5N1 ) vaccine . Blood assessment antibody response obtain time point vaccination . Subjects participate optional sub study also blood obtained enumeration memory B T cell . Subjects follow solicited adverse event 7 day memory aid 56 day unsolicited adverse event . This study link DMID protocol 08-0059 .
